name: Contact Form vCard Generator
author: Ashish Ajani

sections.description:
Contact Form vCard Generator WordPress plugin allows you to generate vCard for all contact inquiries. Contact Form 7 is more like install, activate, configure and ready to go plugin, hence it is widely used across the WordPress sites. We often need to import/export contacts here and there, vCard is one of the way to do that. This plugin is really helpful when you like to generate vCard from Contact inquires generated via Contact Form 7.

Overview

  • Option to use the Contact Form 7 using Shortcode.
  • Map Contact Form 7 fields with vCard fields.
  • Attach vCard in Contact Form 7 email notification upon form submission.
  • Download vCard for individual form entry.
  • Download all form entries in single vCard file.

For detailed information on every features of this plugin including how to map contact form 7 values with vCard attributes you can visit this article WordPress Contact Form vCard Generator

If you have any suggestions/comments or you like to get further information on this plugin please feel free to connect with me. I will make sure to provide guidelines or some useful information for the addressed situation.
sections.installation:
Prerequisites

  1. Contact Form 7 plugin is necessary to use Contact Form vCard Generator.
  2. If you are looking to use any existing contact form (already built with Contact Form 7) then you must edit and save that contact form.

Installation process is very simple for Contact Form vCard Generator plugin. Ways to install plugin:

Installation with FTP:

  1. Download Contact Form vCard Generator plugin.
  2. Extract plugin.
  2. Upload Contact Form vCard Generator directory to the '/wp-content/plugins/' directory.
  3. Go to Plugins option from left menu and activate 'Contact Form vCard Generator' plugin from the list.

Installation with Upload method via WordPress admin panel:

  1. Download Contact Form vCard Generator plugin.
  2. Go to plugins page by clicking on Plugins menu item from left menu.
  3. Click on 'Add New' option.
  4. Upload the plugin and activate.
sections.faq:
Support available?

Yes, I will provide support for any of the query, please allow 48 hours to get back to you.

How many contact forms can be configured?

At a time this plugin will work with only one contact form. In case if you like to generate vCards from multiple contact forms then you may need to use shortcode of every contact form one by one. Please be sure that once you change the shortcode of contact form and submit, you’ll need to map contact form fields with vCard fields again.

Can this plugin generate hCard?

No, this plugin only supports vCard.

Will it work on my Theme?

This plugin is only for backend.

I’ve noticed a bug, what should I do now?

Share details about issue/bug via plugin support option or reach at me through my portfolio website http://freelancer-coder.com.
sections.changelog:
2.2

  • Improved security and resolved issues occuring while generating vCard.

2.1

  • Fixed a bug related to adding a photo to the vCard.

2.0

  • Made it compatible with the latest PHP and WordPress version.
  • Added an ability to add a photo to the vCard.
  • Made the multiselected values working with the vCard (from dropdown).

1.1

  • Resolved attachment issue

1.0

  • Initial release of this plugin

sections.reviews:
Un service de production de VCards appréciable

By michelferaud on February 2, 2021

Facile à utiliser et à paramétrer. Recevoir une VCard pour chaque formulaire renseigné est un gain de temps appréciable pour éviter les erreurs de retranscription. Fonctionne avec WordPress 5.6

Does exactly what it claims

By randallscottholbrook on April 17, 2020

Easy to implement and works smoothly. I had a question and Ashish responded not only with an answer but supplied me with the solution overnight! That is great support.

Not functioning (WP 5.2.3)

By yvanh on October 6, 2019

No support. No point. Why bother?

All you need

By rubengeneva on March 27, 2019

This is a long waited WP CF7 plugin - now you can directly insert contacts from the web into your address-book - previously, copy/paste was required. A true time-saver. Ashish offered to help me until the plugin worked properly on my website. He is a 5* programmer and service provider.

Good job

By kamelia97 on August 29, 2018

It is a good idea
